citations.narrative:
A rabbit has inadequate interior height space in its primary enclosure. The height from the substrate to the top of the
enclosure measures 11.5 inches. When not provided enough space, rabbits can become stressed and engage in
abnormal behaviors. The facility must ensure that the minimum interior height of the enclosure is 14 inches. Correct by
4/11/2024.

There are numerous flies in and around the primary enclosure for a single rabbit. Insects and other pests can be vectors
for disease transmission and may pose as a nuisance to the animal. An effective pest control program must be
established and maintained. Correct by 4/11/2024.

An enclosure that houses three hoffmann’s two-toes sloths contains numerous flies. Insect pests can cause
contamination and disease as well as discomfort to the animals. The facility must establish and maintain a safe and
effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests. Correct by 4/11/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.53(c)(2) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
A rabbit has inadequate interior height space in its primary enclosure. The height from the substrate to the top of the 
enclosure measures 11.5 inches. When not provided enough space, rabbits can become stressed and engage in 
abnormal behaviors. The facility must ensure that the minimum interior height of the enclosure is 14 inches. Correct by 
4/11/2024. 
3.56(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
There are numerous flies in and around the primary enclosure for a single rabbit. Insects and other pests can be vectors 
for disease transmission and may pose as a nuisance to the animal. An effective pest control program must be 
established and maintained. Correct by 4/11/2024. 
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
An enclosure that houses three hoffmann’s two-toes sloths contains numerous flies. Insect pests can cause 
contamination and disease as well as discomfort to the animals. The facility must establish and maintain a safe and 
effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests. Correct by 4/11/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
